Guiding the direction and development of Wavelengthâ€™s offerings and creative process, Michael’s approach to tying insightful, intelligent, interaction into sales & marketing initiatives has positioned Wavelength as a premier digital marketing consultancy.

Before founding Wavelength, Michael cultivated a deep understanding of how businesses succeed, profit, and engage customers through his experience in the food chain and educational markets. Leveraging his business insights, Michael blends business expertise with a passion for design and technology to help organizations succeed in an rapidly expanding digital landscape.

A passionate entrepreneur since age 16, Michael is an authority and sought-after speaker on entrepreneurship, social media, user-centric design, and leveraging technology to grow organizations.

Michael is an advisor to a variety of technology startups and regularly donates his time and talent, to the start-up, non-profit, and higher education community.

Michael received a BA in Business from the University of Kansas, and earned his MBA from the University of Missouri-Kansas City’s Bloch School of Business.
